resources.string: 沒有，而且您的網路是正常的
沒有，但是您的網路不穩
棋局因為以下條件而lag(這些數字越小越好):

The time it takes to process a move on the server. It\'s the same for everybody, and only depends on the server load. The more players and the higher it gets, but Lishogi developers do their best to keep it low. It rarely exceeds 10ms.

The time it takes to send a move from your computer to Lishogi server, and get the response back. It\'s specific to your distance to Lishogi (United Kingdom), and to the quality of your Internet connection. Lishogi developers cannot fix your wifi or make light go faster.
您可以在任何時間找到延遲數據，只要在您的使用者名稱上點一下
我們彌補了網路延遲，這包括持續的延遲和偶爾的延遲尖峰。 到目前為止，基於時間控制和補償延遲存在一些限制和啟發，因此，對於兩個玩家來說，結果都應該是公平的。 所以，比對手高的網路延遲並不是一個障礙！
